absolute calendars adding periods to Absolute Calendar Item
section.para: To add a new Calendar Item to a Calendar, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear if the specified Calendar is an absolute Calendar:
When creating a new Calendar Item for an absolute Calendar, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique name to identify the absolute Calendar Item.
Date entered describes when Calendar Item period will begin.
Select a value between 1 and 999 using the arrow buttons located to the right of the field.
Value entered dictates the length of the specified time period, measured in days.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a new absolute Calendar Item, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the absolute Calendar Item and adds it to the list of Calendar Items.
